biotools.summary: An R package that inclused tools for single cell transcriptomics analysis. It enables users to easily construct and tune pseudotemporal cell ordering as well as analyzing differentially expressed genes. It comes with a user-friendly GUI written in Shiny.

bioschemas.name: TSCAN
bioschemas.summary: An R package that inclused tools for single cell transcriptomics analysis. It enables users to easily construct and tune pseudotemporal cell ordering as well as analyzing differentially expressed genes. It comes with a user-friendly GUI written in Shiny.
